name: TVV Plugin
description: This plugin generates reports using prepared templates and simulation results obtained from CML-Bench
author: Dmitriy Zhuravlyov
content_security_policy: default-src 'self'; script-src https://www.gstatic.com/ https://polyfill.io/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/ 'self'; connect-src * 'self'; style-src https://www.gstatic.com/ https://polyfill.io/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/ 'self'; font-src https://www.gstatic.com/ https://polyfill.io/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/ 'self';
